archimate:TechnologyService.name: Enterprise Service Bus
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Enterprise Service Bus (ESB)
• Purpose: Central integration backbone enabling communication between disparate systems • Capabilities: Message routing, transformation, orchestration, error handling, transaction management • Patterns: Point-to-point, publish-subscribe, request-reply, fire-and-forget • Standards: HL7 v2/v3, HL7 FHIR, DICOM, X12 EDI, custom formats • Technology: MuleSoft, IBM Integration Bus, Microsoft BizTalk, Apache Camel • Benefits: Loose coupling, reusability, centralized management, protocol mediation
